Ok, I'm going to sleep for reals this time. Goodnight all.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Northlight" <domnijoeproductions2001@y...> wrote:
> 
> OOC: Ok..I'm officially P.O.ed!! This is three times in two days where 
> my post has not gone up on the group. I'll post the thing two, maybe 
> three times and still nothing appears!! I'm getting pretty frigging 
> tired of it. Have any of you experianced this problem?
> 
> Oh...Ok...apparently someone above me has had problems, too....
> 
> Anyway, if two messages (or more if this one doesn't post right), 
> please ignore all posts after the first one. Thanx!!

> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Beachcomber looked up and smiled. "They belong to a Badger. Part of 
> the
> > Mustelidae family, a carnivorous mammal." Beachcomber explained. He
> > extended one finger pointing to the paw marks. "Note the deep gashes 
> in
> > the ground." he began. "Badgers have long claws used for burrowing, 
> they
> > live underground for protection."
> > 
> > Firedrill was absolutely ingrossed in this. He looked up at 
> Beachcomber
> > with childlike bewilderment. He made sure to remember that, he was 
> sure
> > going to enjoy this planet. He ran his finger gently through the 
> tack,
> > to feel them.
> 
> 
> ::REDHOT::
> 
>     Redhot gave a humored snort.
>     "What curious creatures this planet has.." he said. He looked up 
> at the blue Autobot with calm eyes. They were so peaceful and 
> non-agressive that one would have never known he was a former 
> Decepticon.
>     "I remember when I was on outer post five" he said, his old self 
> shining through the discomfort of his injuries. "There were... these 
> blue things about yay big..." He spread his hands about two feet 
> apart. "..with two rows of teeth. Bloody things bit so hard they left 
> dents. Not without losing a mouth full of teeth, mind you." He 
> chuckled at the memory. "It musta hurt like hell."
> 
> Northlight
> Domnijoe Productions
>
